message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product.  To kick things off, I'd like to propose a starting price of $1,500,000.  I believe this reflects the true value and potential of what I'm offering.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $1,000,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000.
